```js title=lib_js.js
"use strict";
(self["webpackChunkwebpack"] = self["webpackChunkwebpack"] || []).push([["lib_js"], {
"./lib.js"(__unused_webpack_module, __webpack_exports__, __webpack_require__) {
__webpack_require__.r(__webpack_exports__);
__webpack_require__.d(__webpack_exports__, {
  "default": () => (__rspack_default_export)
});
/* import */ var _test__rspack_import_0 = __webpack_require__("./test.js");

function myanswer() {
	_test__rspack_import_0["default"];
}

/* export default */ const __rspack_default_export = (myanswer);


},
"./test.js"(__unused_webpack_module, __webpack_exports__, __webpack_require__) {
__webpack_require__.d(__webpack_exports__, {
  "default": () => (__rspack_default_export)
});
function test() {}

/* export default */ const __rspack_default_export = (test);


},

}]);
```

```js title=main.js
"use strict";
(self["webpackChunkwebpack"] = self["webpackChunkwebpack"] || []).push([["main"], {
"./app.js"(__unused_webpack_module, __webpack_exports__, __webpack_require__) {
__webpack_require__.d(__webpack_exports__, {
  answer: () => (answer)
});
const answer = 30;


},
"./index.js"(__unused_webpack_module, __unused_webpack___webpack_exports__, __webpack_require__) {
/* import */ var _app__rspack_import_0 = __webpack_require__("./app.js");

const a = test(() => __webpack_require__.e(/* import() */ "lib_js").then(__webpack_require__.bind(__webpack_require__, "./lib.js")));
(0,_app__rspack_import_0.answer)();
a;


},

},function(__webpack_require__) {
var __webpack_exec__ = function(moduleId) { return __webpack_require__(__webpack_require__.s = moduleId) }
var __webpack_exports__ = (__webpack_exec__("./index.js"));

}
]);
```
